title: Must Read: Ulta Beauty Partners with Beyoncé's 'Cowboy Carter' Tour, Kering Unveils Its New 'Water-Positive' Strategy
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Monday. Ulta will be the official beauty retail partner for Beyoncé's "Cowboy Carter" Tour. The partnership gives shoppers a unique, "Cowboy Carter" Tour-inspired experience, including a curated beauty collection, tour makeup ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
